{{Wireless embedded system |brand=NEXIOM |model=TR307 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/06/2011 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Z9R-TR307 |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=AC |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9825G6JH-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''300M 4-in-1 Travel Router''
[http://www.nexiom.cc/product/smart%20wireless/tr307.html Product page]
[http://www.nexiom.cc/download/Nexiom%20Travel%20Router%20User%20Guide.pdf Manual] It appears that this device can be powered via AC (standard US plug) or through a Mini-USB port on the device. "0124C-TOP" is silkscreened on the bottom of the main board. :"0124C-BOTTOM" is silkscreened on the back of the wireless module board. '''Nexiom''''s manual states the default SSID is '''Nexiom307_xxxx''' (w/ default password of nexixxxx). ==Images== [[File:NEXIOM TR307.gif]][[Has images::external| ]]
